ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You cannot put no-drop items (or at least no-trade no-drop items) in trade windows.  You get a message saying that item cannot be traded, dropped, or sold.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Sep 1999 John.Curry@... wrote:
>
> I think that party effect would be less realistic. More convienient for
> sure, but not as roleplayable. Here is my take.
>
> I think the trade window is the key. This is how you show items to friends
> anyway, with relative safty. Make the song so that items in the trade

You cannot put no-drop items (or at least no-trade no-drop
items) in trade windows. You get a message saying that item
cannot be traded, dropped, or sold.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
